welcome_message_body: Welcome to Purwokerto, Indonesia! Get ready to experience the charm of this vibrant city, known for its beautiful natural landscapes, rich cultural heritage, and delicious local cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Purwokerto has to offer!

restaurants.name: BAKSO DAN SOTO SAMI ASIH
restaurants.description: BAKSO DAN SOTO SAMI ASIH is a asian restaurant located in Purwokerto.
restaurants.address: Jl. Pramuka, Purwokerto, Purwokerto, Jawa Tengah
